about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a European Web Developer based in Venezuela. I've a degree in Computer Engineering from the Jose Antonio Paez University. I love Linux and I've been using it since I was 12 years old. I've been programming for almost 6 years now, specializen in JavaScript and NodeJS.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: In my time as a Web Developer, I learned a variety of Computational Languages, Libraries, Frameworks, Databases and tools. I'm specialized in JavaScript and use it fro both, Frontend and Backend development. In Frontend I find myself mostly using ReactJS, and ExpressJS for the Backend.

rnet.title: RNet Blog
rnet.description: RNet is a blog about technology. The idea was to make a web page while thinking about the problems that experiences people with visual disability while navigating the web. I was responsible for the UI design, UX and Frontend development and a API to use as Backend.
rnet.technologies: This project was built using Angular and SemanticUI for the Frontend. The Backend was built using NodeJS and ExpressJS, the Database used was MongoDB.

ujap.title: UJAP Online
ujap.description: For the Jose Antonio Paez University, I created a redisigned interface for their online platform using new technologies and design tendencies. I was responsible for UI design, UX and Frontend development and a new API for the platform.
ujap.technologies: This projects was built using ReactJS, Sass and CoreUI for the Frontend. The Backend was built using NodeJS and ExpressJS, also the database used was MongoDB.
